title: Fallout.4.REPACK-KaOs
description:
Release-Title:------------[ Fallout.4-KaOs ]- 
                                              
Language:-----------------[ English ]-        
                                              
Release/Size:-------------[ 16.4GIG ]-        
                                              
Release/Date:-------------[ 11-11-15 ]-       
                                              
Ripped/Packed:------------[ KaOsKrew ]-       
                                              
Iso/Crack:----------------[ Codex ]-          
                                              
Ripped/Removed:-----------[ Nothing ]-        
                                              
Movie/Recode:-------------[ 720p ]-           
                                              
Audio/Recode:-------------[ Partial ]-        
                                              
Texture/Recode:-----------[ Untouched ]-      
                                              
Rebuild/Temp/Space:-------[ Estimated 45GIG ]-
                                              
Final/Used/Space:---------[ 22.8GIG ]-        
                                              
Drivers/Extras:-----------[ DX, VcRedist ]-   



Step-1:-------[ Unrar Using Latest Winrar Or Equivilant ]-     
                                                               
Step-2:-------[ Click Install.exe                              
                Select Install Location And Wait For The       
                Game Data To Be Extracted/Rebuilt ]-           
                                                               
Step-3:-------[ Click Fallout4Launcher.exe To Play             
                Or Use The Created Desktop Shortcut ]-         
                                                               
Depending On The Release One Or More Command Windows May Open  
They Must Be Allowed To Finish And Should Not Be Closed Until  
Otherwise Prompted.                                            
                                                               
                                                               
                                                               
Estimated Install Time:- 30 Mins On A SSD           8 Cores [*]
                                                    4 Cores [ ]
                                                               
                                                               
Notes:                                                         
                                                               
                                                               
We Recommend Installing To A Short Path (Like The Install.exe  
Default) As Long Path Names Can Cause Missing Files On Games   
With A Deep Directory Structure.                               
                                                               
Install/Rebuild Is Normally Very Time/Space Consuming.         
(So Ensure You Have Pleanty Of Space And Patience)             
                                                               
                                                               
Group Notes:                                                   
                                                               
Due To The Sheer Size Of Games Now We Have Been Forced To      
Semi Retire Our Beloved Install.exe                            
The New Upgraded Version Is Still A Rushed Early Release But We
Have High Hopes For Its Future :)                              



**FALSE-POSITIVES**                                           
                                                              
In Some Cases Some Of Our Tools May Get Detected As Suspicious
Or As A Virus By Some Antivirus Software. This Is Also The    
Case With Some Cracks/NoDVDs. We Assure You This Is A False   
Possitive And All Our Files Are Clean. If Any Of These Files  
Are Deleted The Chances Are The Game Will Not Start Or Will   
Function Incorrectly.                                         
                                                              
**GAME-FAILED?**                                              
                                                              
If You Are Left With Empty Folders You Have More Than Likely  
Run Out Of Temporary Hard Drive Space For Decompression.      
Free Up Alot More Space And Reinstall.                        
                                                              
If You Are Missing Textures Or Audio Your Antivirus Has More  
Than Likely Deleted One Of Our Tools, Disable Your AV And     
Install Again.                                                
                                                              
If The Game Will Simply Not Start Check Minimum Requirements, 
Update All Your Drivers, Check Our Extras Folder For Missing  
Drivers Or Reg Data What May Have Failed To Install. Also     
Make Sure Your Antivirus Has Not Deleted Anything It Should   
Not Have
